member.name: T:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.Drink
member.summary: The base drink class. Extends MenuItem, so inherits Price, Calories, and Ingredients.

member.name: P:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.Drink.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of this drink.

member.name: P:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.Drink.Ice
member.summary: Gets or sets whether there is ice in this drink.

member.name: M:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.Drink.HoldIce
member.summary: Allows the user to hold the ice in this drink.

member.name: T:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.JurassicJava
member.summary: A drink class that represents a cup of coffee.

member.name: P:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.JurassicJava.Size
member.summary: An enum variable which stores the size of this drink.

member.name: P:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.JurassicJava.Ingredients
member.summary: A list of ingredients for this drink.

member.name: P:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.JurassicJava.Ice
member.summary: An overridden ice variable which defaults to false.

member.name: P:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.JurassicJava.RoomForCream
member.summary: Whether the server should leave room for cream in this coffee. Sadly, does not decrease the price. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.JurassicJava.Decalf
member.summary: Whether this coffee is decalf. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.JurassicJava.#ctor
member.summary: The constructor for the JurassicJava drink.

member.name: M:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.JurassicJava.AddIce
member.summary: Allows the user to add ice to this drink.

member.name: M:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.JurassicJava.LeaveRoomForCream
member.summary: Directs the server to leave room for cream.

member.name: M:DinoDiner.Menu.Drinks.JurassicJava.MakeDecalf
member.summary: Makes this coffee decalf.

member.summary: A list of ingredients for this drink.

member.summary: The flavor or flavors of this soda. Use the bitwise OR operator to set multiple flavors. Defaults to the generic cola flavor only.

member.summary: Whether or not this tea has lemon. Defaults to false.

member.summary: Allows the user to make the tea sweet.
